Spre deosebire de rusine, care ataca identitatea, vinovatia priveste comportamentul — 'am facut ceva rau', nu 'sunt rau'. Vinovatia sanatoasa te motiveaza sa repari si sa te schimbi. Vinovatia cronica si nerezolvata devine o povara care erodeaza bucuria de a trai.
description.en: Guilt is the painful awareness that you did something wrong or hurt someone. Unlike shame, which attacks identity, guilt targets behavior — 'I did something bad', not 'I am bad'. Healthy guilt motivates you to repair and change. Chronic and unresolved guilt becomes a burden that erodes the joy of living.

description.ro: Disperarea este starea in care speranta pare sa fi disparut complet — viitorul pare inchis si nu mai vezi nicio cale de iesire. Este una dintre cele mai intunecate experiente emotionale umane. Disperarea este un semnal de alarma ca ai nevoie urgenta de conexiune si sprijin. Chiar si in cele mai intunecate momente, o mana intinsa poate face diferenta.
description.en: Despair is the state where hope seems to have completely disappeared — the future seems closed and you see no way out. It is one of the darkest human emotional experiences. Despair is an alarm signal that you urgently need connection and support. Even in the darkest moments, an outstretched hand can make the difference.

description.ro: Vulnerabilitatea este starea de a fi deschis si expus la potentiala durere. Desi instinctiv cautam sa evitam vulnerabilitatea, cercetarile arata ca este poarta catre intimitate, autenticitate si conexiune profunda. A fi vulnerabil nu inseamna a fi slab — inseamna a avea curajul de a te arata asa cum esti, fara garantia ca vei fi acceptat.
description.en: Vulnerability is the state of being open and exposed to potential pain. Though we instinctively seek to avoid vulnerability, research shows it is the gateway to intimacy, authenticity, and deep connection. Being vulnerable doesn't mean being weak — it means having the courage to show yourself as you are, without the guarantee of being accepted.

description.ro: Singuratatea este durerea de a fi deconectat — nu neaparat de a fi singur fizic, ci de a nu te simti vazut, inteles si conectat emotional. Singuratatea cronica este un factor de risc major pentru sanatate, comparable cu fumatul. Vindecarea singuratatii nu vine din a fi inconjurat de oameni, ci din a avea relatii in care te simti cu adevarat cunoscut.
description.en: Loneliness is the pain of being disconnected — not necessarily being physically alone, but not feeling seen, understood, and emotionally connected. Chronic loneliness is a major health risk factor, comparable to smoking. Healing loneliness doesn't come from being surrounded by people, but from having relationships where you feel truly known.

description.ro: Jena in contextul tristetii este o rusine blanda amestecata cu vulnerabilitate — te simti expus intr-un mod care te face sa vrei sa te ascunzi. Este sentimentul de a fi vazut intr-un moment de slabiciune sau de a fi facut ceva stangaci. Jena este tranzitorie si de obicei disproportionata fata de situatie — altii o observa mult mai putin decat crezi.
description.en: Embarrassment in the context of sadness is a mild shame mixed with vulnerability — you feel exposed in a way that makes you want to hide. It is the feeling of being seen in a moment of weakness or having done something clumsy. Embarrassment is transient and usually disproportionate to the situation — others notice it far less than you think.

description.ro: Dezamagirea in contextul tristetii este durerea calma a asteptarilor neimplinite — nu furia, ci doliul pentru ceea ce ar fi putut fi. Este acceptarea trista ca realitatea nu corespunde sperantelor tale. Dezamagirea repetata poate eroda optimismul si increderea. Procesarea constientea a dezamagirii include ajustarea asteptarilor fara a renunta la speranta.
description.en: Disappointment in the context of sadness is the calm pain of unfulfilled expectations — not anger, but grief for what could have been. It is the sad acceptance that reality doesn't match your hopes. Repeated disappointment can erode optimism and trust. Conscious processing of disappointment includes adjusting expectations without giving up hope.

description.ro: Golul emotional este absenta dureroasa a sentimentului — o stare in care interiorul tau pare vid si deconectat de viata. Nu durere, nu bucurie — doar un spatiu pustiu. Golul poate fi un simptom al depresiei, al dezlegarii de sine sau al pierderii sensului. Recuperarea vine prin reconectarea treptata cu corpul, cu natura si cu relatiile care te ancoreaza.
description.en: Emotional emptiness is the painful absence of feeling — a state where your interior seems void and disconnected from life. No pain, no joy — just a barren space. Emptiness can be a symptom of depression, disconnection from self, or loss of meaning. Recovery comes through gradual reconnection with the body, nature, and relationships that anchor you.

description.ro: Sentimentul de inferioritate in contextul tristetii este durerea tacuta a comparatiei — te vezi constant mai putin decat ceilalti si aceasta convingere iti coloreaza toata experienta. Nu este furie, ci resemnare trista. Este ecoul vocilor critice care ti-au spus ca nu esti destul. Vindecarea incepe cu recunoasterea ca valoarea ta nu se masoara prin comparatie.
description.en: The feeling of inferiority in the context of sadness is the quiet pain of comparison — you constantly see yourself as less than others and this conviction colors all your experience. It's not anger, but sad resignation. It is the echo of critical voices that told you you're not enough. Healing begins with recognizing that your value is not measured by comparison.

description.ro: Remuscarea este forma profunda a vinovatiei — nu doar stii ca ai gresit, ci simti in tot corpul greutatea a ceea ce ai facut. Este emotia care te face sa vrei sa intorci timpul si sa repari ce ai stricat. Remuscarea autentica este necesara pentru reparatie si iertare, dar trebuie sa duca la actiune, nu sa ramana o auto-pedepsire perpetua.
description.en: Remorse is the deep form of guilt — you don't just know you were wrong, but feel in your entire body the weight of what you did. It is the emotion that makes you want to turn back time and repair what you broke. Authentic remorse is necessary for repair and forgiveness, but it must lead to action, not remain perpetual self-punishment.

description.ro: Rusinea este convingerea dureroasa ca esti defect in esenta ta — nu ca ai facut ceva gresit, ci ca esti ceva gresit. Este una dintre cele mai dureroase emotii umane, care te face sa vrei sa dispari sau sa te ascunzi. Rusinea toxica isi are originile in experienta de a nu fi fost acceptat neconditionat. Vindecarea vine prin relatii in care esti primit complet.
description.en: Shame is the painful conviction that you are defective at your core — not that you did something wrong, but that you are something wrong. It is one of the most painful human emotions, making you want to disappear or hide. Toxic shame originates in the experience of not having been unconditionally accepted. Healing comes through relationships where you are fully received.

description.ro: Doliul este procesul natural de adaptare la o pierdere profunda — moartea cuiva drag, sfarsitul unei relatii sau disparitia unui vis. Doliul nu are un calendar si nu urmeaza etape liniare. Vine in valuri — uneori coplesitoare, alteori calme. A-ti permite doliul este esential pentru vindecare. Nu exista un mod gresit de a suferi.
description.en: Grief is the natural process of adapting to a profound loss — the death of someone dear, the end of a relationship, or the disappearance of a dream. Grief has no calendar and doesn't follow linear stages. It comes in waves — sometimes overwhelming, sometimes calm. Allowing yourself to grieve is essential for healing. There is no wrong way to mourn.

needs.ro: timp, marturisire si permisiunea de a jelui
needs.en: time, witnessing, and permission to mourn

description.ro: Neputinta este experienta devastatoare ca nu poti influenta sau schimba o situatie care te face sa suferi. Este opusul agentivitatii — simti ca viata ti se intampla si tu nu ai niciun control. Neputinta invatata este un factor central in depresie. Recuperarea incepe cu identificarea oricat de mic a unui lucru pe care il poti controla si actionarea asupra lui.
description.en: Powerlessness is the devastating experience that you cannot influence or change a situation that causes you suffering. It is the opposite of agency — you feel that life happens to you and you have no control. Learned helplessness is a central factor in depression. Recovery begins with identifying however small a thing you can control and acting on it.

description.ro: Fragilitatea este starea in care te simti ca te-ai putea rupe la cel mai mic impact — emotional, psihologic sau relational. Esti intact dar pe muchie. Fragilitatea apare dupa perioade de stres intens, pierdere sau trauma. Nu este slabiciune permanenta, ci o stare temporara care cere grija, rabdare si protejarea constienta a resurselor limitate.
description.en: Fragility is the state where you feel you could break at the slightest impact — emotionally, psychologically, or relationally. You are intact but on the edge. Fragility appears after periods of intense stress, loss, or trauma. It is not permanent weakness, but a temporary state that requires care, patience, and conscious protection of limited resources.

description.ro: A te simti victimizat este experienta ca ti s-a facut o nedreptate de catre forte mai puternice decat tine. Poate reflecta o realitate obiectiva de abuz sau poate deveni o pozitie existentiala din care refuzi sa iesi. Victimizarea reala merita validare si sprijin. Identitatea de victima permanenta, insa, te blocheaza in neputinta si te impiedica sa iti recastigi puterea.
description.en: Feeling victimized is the experience that injustice was done to you by forces more powerful than yourself. It can reflect an objective reality of abuse or can become an existential position you refuse to leave. Real victimization deserves validation and support. Permanent victim identity, however, locks you in helplessness and prevents you from reclaiming your power.

description.ro: Abandonul este una dintre cele mai profunde rani emotionale — experienta ca cineva esential a plecat si te-a lasat singur cand aveai cea mai mare nevoie. Abandonul din copilarie lasa amprente care se reactiveaza in relatiile adulte. Frica de abandon poate duce la atasament anxios, dependenta sau, paradoxal, la evitarea completa a intimatatii.
description.en: Abandonment is one of the deepest emotional wounds — the experience that someone essential left and left you alone when you needed them most. Childhood abandonment leaves imprints that reactivate in adult relationships. Fear of abandonment can lead to anxious attachment, dependency, or paradoxically, complete avoidance of intimacy.

description.ro: Izolarea este starea de separare completa de ceilalti — nu doar fizica, ci si emotionala si existentiala. Te simti singur intr-un mod care pare permanent si fara scapare. Izolarea cronica este una dintre cele mai mari amenintari la sanatatea mentala si fizica. Drumul inapoi catre conexiune incepe cu un singur pas — un mesaj, un apel, o mana intinsa.
description.en: Isolation is the state of complete separation from others — not just physical, but emotional and existential. You feel alone in a way that seems permanent and without escape. Chronic isolation is one of the greatest threats to mental and physical health. The road back to connection begins with a single step — a message, a call, an outstretched hand.

description.ro: Dorul este un concept emotional profund romanesc — un amestec dulce-amar de iubire, tristete si speranta indreptate catre cineva sau ceva absent. Dorul te conecteaza cu ceea ce conteaza cel mai mult pentru tine, chiar cand acel lucru este departe. Functia lui adaptiva este sa pastreze vie legatura interioara cu persoanele, locurile si momentele care ti-au modelat identitatea.
description.en: Dor is a deeply Romanian emotional concept — a bittersweet blend of love, sadness, and hope directed toward someone or something absent. It connects you to what matters most, even when that thing is far away. Its adaptive function is to keep alive the inner bond with the people, places, and moments that have shaped your identity.

description.ro: Singuratatea este semnalul emotional ca nevoia ta fundamentala de apartenenta si conexiune autentica nu este implinita. Spre deosebire de izolare, singuratatea poate aparea chiar si in mijlocul multimii — este despre calitatea legaturilor, nu despre cantitate. Functia ei adaptiva este sa te motiveze sa cauti relatii autentice si sa investesti in legaturi care iti hranesc sufletul.
description.en: Loneliness is the emotional signal that your fundamental need for belonging and authentic connection is unmet. Unlike isolation, loneliness can arise even in a crowd — it is about the quality of bonds, not quantity. Its adaptive function is to motivate you to seek genuine relationships and invest in connections that nourish your soul.

description.ro: Nostalgia este o emotie dulce-amara care te transporta in momente semnificative din trecut — nu pentru a fugi de prezent, ci pentru a regasi un sentiment de continuitate si sens. Cercetarile arata ca nostalgia contracareaza singuratatea si intareste sentimentul de identitate. Functia ei adaptiva este sa iti reaminteasca cine esti si de unde vii, oferindu-ti resurse emotionale pentru prezent.
description.en: Nostalgia is a bittersweet emotion that transports you to meaningful moments from the past — not to escape the present, but to rediscover a sense of continuity and meaning. Research shows nostalgia counteracts loneliness and strengthens the sense of identity. Its adaptive function is to remind you who you are and where you come from, providing emotional resources for the present.

description.ro: Compasiunea este capacitatea de a recunoaste suferinta celuilalt si de a simti un impuls autentic de a ajuta. Este mai mult decat empatie — include si actiunea, dorinta de a alina durerea pe care o percepi. Functia ei adaptiva este sa intareasca legaturile sociale si sa creeze retele de sprijin reciproc, facandu-ne mai rezilienti impreuna decat singuri.
description.en: Compassion is the capacity to recognize another's suffering and feel a genuine impulse to help. It is more than empathy — it includes action, the desire to ease the pain you perceive. Its adaptive function is to strengthen social bonds and create networks of mutual support, making us more resilient together than alone.

description.ro: Usurarea este eliberarea emotionala care vine dupa ce o amenintare, o tensiune sau o incertitudine a trecut. Este corpul si mintea ta care se relaxeaza dupa o perioada de alerta. Functia adaptiva a usurarii este sa semnaleze ca esti din nou in siguranta si sa permita sistemului nervos sa revina la echilibru, creand spatiu pentru odihna si recuperare.
description.en: Relief is the emotional release that comes after a threat, tension, or uncertainty has passed. It is your body and mind relaxing after a period of alertness. The adaptive function of relief is to signal that you are safe again and allow the nervous system to return to balance, creating space for rest and recovery.
